name: Spore

game.exe: drive_c/ProgramData/SPORE ModAPI Launcher Kit/Spore ModAPI Launcher.exe

script.requires: spore-origin | spore-origin-d9vk | spore-gog | spore-gog-d9vk | spore-steam | spore-steam-d9vk

content:
custom-name: Spore ModAPI
files:
- modApiInstaller:
    filename: SporeModApi.exe
    url: https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1enaNUryG7ElSbYFLDLBI-XHaeie8ZPwR
game:
  exe: drive_c/ProgramData/SPORE ModAPI Launcher Kit/Spore ModAPI Launcher.exe
installer:
- task:
    app: dotnet452
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Setting version to 7...
    key: Version
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: win7
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing the ModAPI
    executable: modApiInstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
requires: spore-origin | spore-origin-d9vk | spore-gog | spore-gog-d9vk | spore-steam
  | spore-steam-d9vk
